projects: [{"title":"Heat Transfer Study using Lattice Boltzmann Method | Bachelor Thesis","start_date":"Aug 2016","description":"LBM is a discrete computational method based upon the Boltzmann Equation.- Investigating isothermal and non-isothermal flow problems using Lattice Boltzmann Method- Implementing LBM using single-relaxation time model for single phase flows - Solving Lid driven cavity and natural convection problems using LBM and analyzing the velocity and temperature variation"},{},{"title":"Mahindra Rise Prize Solar Innovation Challenge","start_date":"Jun 2014","description":"Competition aimed to develop cost-effective DIY kit for urban areas in India.- Achieved the target of reducing projected area of solar panels by 30% and cost by 10% - Represented IIT Kharagpur in the First Phase of the competition held at Mumbai - Amongst 15 out of 459 participating teams across India to reach the final phase of the competition "}]
